hazaar rahe mudake dekhi
itani pile ke zamaane ko sharaabi kar de
pyaar kare aari chalwaaye, aise aashiq se dariyo
ke mastee me tumko khuda keh gaya
o basanti
mujhe kya pataa thaa kabhi ishq me
mai khushnasib hu mujhko kisi ka pyaar mila
aao aao aao twist kare jaag utha mausam
kam nahi tum, kam nahi tum, socho zara
mai hu pardesi
hai khot tere man me jo bhagavaan se hai dur
insaaf kaa mandir hai ye bhagavaan kaa ghar hai
sajan re jhooth mat bolo,
aa dekhe jara, kisme kitna hai dam
o rab jhut na bulaye tauba jhut na bulaye
utare kabhee naa jo khumaar, woh pyaar hain
once in every lifetime
majnu bana dun aisi mai laila
kabhi to dega sanate me pyar bhari aavaz koi
yu hi din bitega, bitegi raina
teri aankh me jo sarur hai
tum dekhoge
hum laut aayenge tum yuhi bulate rehna
sune shahar me jaise bajane lage shahanaayee
tujhe jitna pyar hai daolat se han ji daulat se
ek bhale maanush ko
ye mohabbat ke pal kitne anamol hai
mera suna padha re sangeet
sun sun sun, are baabu sun, is champi me bade bade gun
ho mere saajna din aa gaye hain pyar ke
lekar naam naseebo ka
humne jo dekhe sapne
mohabbat ki basti basayenge hum
yaa zindagani luta do
yaha sadke hai vaha galiya thi yaha kante hai waha kaliya thi
dil kya kare jab kisee se, kisiko pyar ho jaye
duniya jawan hai mere liye mere liye
aaj tak aisi hasi cheez na dekhi hogi
ab bhi tere surkh hontho ke pyale
